thread.section_title: Park Hyatt Paris - Vendome - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The best hotel in Paris!
thread.title_full: The best hotel in Paris! - Review of Park Hyatt Paris - Vendome, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Bridget C
title: The best hotel in Paris!
text:
Loved this hotel!! Absolutely beautiful even during construction, fabulous location and food, and the BEST staff! Also their provided toiletries are absolutely divine, Blaise Mautin custom scent - absolutely amazing!
When I arrived at this hotel I had food poisoning and even though we were hours early for check-in they were able to call the maid service and have the room ready in under 20 minutes.
Every aspect of this hotel was fantastic, I will never stay anywhere else when I am in Paris - and I think I need to check out their other locations as well :)
